Side n__ Latin i_ an ama____ language wi__ very f__ irregular ve___ whereas Eng____ is mo__ a lang____ that be___ up ot___ languages a__ takes t__ most conf_____ parts fr__ them. data.fullContent: But end the Roman Empire did otherwise we would all probably still be speaking Latin. Side not Latin is an amazing language with very few irregular verbs whereas English is more a language that beats up other languages and takes the most confusing parts from them. Tell me again why we don't still speak Latin? I'm looking at you Anglo and Saxon Germanic tribes.
data.answer: 但是罗马帝国灭亡了否则我们可能还会说拉丁语。非拉丁语是一门几乎没有不规则动词的神奇语言，而英语更像是一门打败其他语言的语言，从其他语言中拿走了最令人困惑的部分。再告诉我一次，为什么我们还不说拉丁语?我看到的是盎格鲁撒克逊日耳曼部落。
